author: stahlleiton
body:
#### PR description:

This PR creates a new era "Run2_2016_UPC" meant for the re-reco of 2016 pPb data using the UPC reconstruction. It includes the same era modifiers (highBetaStar_2018, egamma_lowPt_exclusive and run3_upc) introduced in https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/43378 on top of the Run2_2016 era.

A new relval 142.903 is added to test the new era. This relval will require a new run2 data global tag including the low pT egamma regression and dEdx calibration tags, which for the time being are included in the relval through a customize command (temporary customization to be able to test the PR, to be removed after the GT is updated and before the PR is merged).

More details on the validations done are documented in the [slide](https://docs.google.com/presentation/d/18ilaOBCV2QTQBy2ta3PF4OJzp66C_OpOPBUrQdOh0Dg/edit?usp=sharing)

@mandrenguyen 

#### PR validation:

Tested using the relvals 180,180.1,181,181.1,141.901,142.901,142.903

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

This PR will be backported to 14_1_X.
title: Era for UPC re-reco of 2016 pPb data
